document_data.name: ''Cast-off Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cast-off armor''''' was [[armor]] that was [[magic item|magically]] enchanted to become exceedingly quick for its wearer to doff.
document_data.Description: Any type of armor could be enchanted to become ''cast-off armor''.
document_data.Powers: While normal armor took between 1 and 5 minutes to remove depending on its complexity, ''cast-off armor'' could be completely removed within only a few seconds, regardless of type.
